verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let Your spirit rise within me (2x). You set my feet a dancing And my heart rejoicing And my mouth singing our Your praise (2x){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will arise and go forth In the name of the Lord of Hosts For He has conquered every foe By His name, by His name.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will declare, He is the Lord I will trust and not be afraid I will arise and go forth By His name, by His name.{/lang-eng}
